definition: Portugal/Portuguese/abbr. for 葡萄牙[Pu2 tao2 ya2]

sentences.english: French and Portuguese are Romance languages.
sentences.chinese: 法語和葡萄牙語都是羅曼語。

sentences.english: During that time, he also learned Spanish and  Portuguese as a hobby.
sentences.chinese: 作爲業餘愛好，他還學習了西班牙語和葡萄牙語。

sentences.english: This town is for Georgians as Fátima is for Portuguese.
sentences.chinese: 這個鎮爲格魯吉亞法蒂瑪是爲葡萄牙語。

sentences.english: Transparent Language offers this Portuguese language test for self-evaluation purposes only.
sentences.chinese: 透明語言提供此葡萄牙語測試自我評價的目的。

sentences.english: Despite its Anglo-Saxon outlook, it is more Portuguese than Irish.
sentences.chinese: 儘管它的盎格魯撒克遜的前景，它比愛爾蘭葡萄牙語。

sentences.english: She translates legal documents into Portuguese.
sentences.chinese: 她把法律文件翻譯成葡萄牙語。

sentences.english: Learning Portuguese is a rich and rewarding experience, but it takes time.
sentences.chinese: 學習葡萄牙語是件花時卻豐富多彩的事情。

sentences.english: Most Lista messages are in Portuguese.
sentences.chinese: 大多數利斯塔消息在葡萄牙語。

definition: radical of a compound word (in European language)
Confucius Institute, organization established internationally by the PRC, promoting Chinese language and culture
East Timor (officially Democratic Republic of Timor-Leste)
